tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE batch_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    batch_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    production_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (batch_id) REFERENCES batch_numbers(batch_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Product (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    name STRING NOT NULL,    batch_number STRING NOT NULL,    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE Manufacturer (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    name STRING NOT NULL,    location STRING,    phone_number STRING )
CREATE TABLE Batch (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    product_id UUID NOT NULL,    batch_number STRING NOT NULL,    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,    quantity INT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE Inventory (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    product_id UUID NOT NULL,    batch_id UUID NOT NULL,    quantity INT NOT NULL,    location STRING NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE ProductBatches (
  batch_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Warehouses (
  warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  warehouse_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ExpiryAlerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  batch_number INT,
  expiration_date DATE
)
